title: Does anyone else really not like the newly implemented "emotes"
body:
I actually think emotes aren't such a bad idea, but the current ones seem poorly designed and quite frankly...ugly. Riot could have done a much better job, and I don't think it's too much to ask for if you're spending what's essentially $5 for each one. I'm not claiming I could personally do better but it seems more like mediocre fan art than something done by a professional. 

I also resent OCE being used as a test server for larger regions, like how many bugs can a simple graphic have? Makes it seems like they don't care about us as much.  ;/
